alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:56PM CDT until June 17 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waynesboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Chatom, Clara, Millry and Buckatunna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
